H0.text: A planet close to Earth is the best description of the sun, which provides heat and light to Earth.

H1.text: The closest star to Earth is the sun, which provides heat and light to Earth.

H2.text: A planet that reflects light is the best description of the sun, which provides heat and light to Earth.

H3.text: The center of the universe is the best description of the sun that provides heat and light to Earth.

A4.text: The Sun is a G-type main-sequence star (G2V), informally called a yellow dwarf

A5.text: The Sun is the main source of energy for life on Earth
